(:action forage ; Forage a resource and update its status
    :parameters (?resource - entity ?location - location)
    :precondition (and 
                    (at_location ?resource ?location)
                    (known_resource ?resource)
                    (accessible ?location))
    :effect (and 
              (collected ?resource)
              (not (at_location ?resource ?location))

(:action build
    :parameters (?builder - agent ?tool - object ?location - location ?material1 - object ?material2 - object)
    :precondition (and
                    (available ?builder)
                    (in_sunlight ?location)
                    (has ?builder ?tool)
                    (has ?builder ?material1)
                    (has ?builder ?material2))
    :effect (and
              (built ?builder ?location)
              (created ?location ?material1 ?material2 ?tool))

(:action filter
    ; Abstract action to filter a resource using a specified method
    :parameters (?resource - entity ?method - tool)
    :precondition (and (contaminated ?resource) (type ?method filter))
    :effect (and (not (contaminated ?resource))

(:action start ; Initialize or activate a process or entity
    :parameters (?entity - entity ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and (not (activated ?entity)) (prepared ?resource))
    :effect (and (activated ?entity) (utilized ?resource))

(:action collect
    ; Collect resources and update their status
    :parameters (?collector - agent ?source - resource ?destination - location)
    :precondition (and (available ?collector) (resource_available ?source))
    :effect (and (resource_collected ?destination) (not (resource_available ?source))

(:action bend ; Perform a state-changing action on a resource and update its status
  :parameters (?entity - object ?resource - object ?additional - object)
  :precondition (and (resource_collected ?entity) (ready ?additional))
  :effect (and (resource_processed ?resource) (not (resource_collected ?entity))
